introduction.title: Welcome to the Reading Adventure!
introduction.description: This guide will help you support young readers in their learning journey.

cvc.title: CVC Words
tips: Use hand motions for each sound

troubleshooting.hesitation: If the child hesitates, give them time to sound it out
troubleshooting.mistakes: Mistakes are learning opportunities - stay positive
troubleshooting.frustration: Take breaks when needed and return with fresh energy
